items.sentence: It never occurred to me that Tom would be there.
These kinds of storms can occur without warning.
It never occurred to me that I might get caught.
It would be wise to start looking for a new job.
It would be wise to find another way to do that.
It would be wise to listen to Tom's suggestions.
I found the box right where Tom said he left it.
The paper aeroplane slowly glided to the ground.
I wasn't aware that Tom was supposed to do that.
There's a ferry to the island three times a day.
